title: Duties of the board of education
context: PART I. GENERAL PROVISIONS Note Part heading added by L 1993, c 327, §2 and amended by L 1993, c 327, §3; L 1996, c 144, §2; L 1999, c 29, §2; L 2001, c 107, §2. §312-1 Duties of the board of education. The board of education shall care for, manage, and control all property set apart, donated, loaned to, or in any manner acquired for the use of libraries; receive, care for, expend, and account for any money which may be received for the purpose of erecting buildings for libraries or for any other purposes of the libraries. [L 1909, c 83, §2; RL 1925, §417; RL 1935, §801; RL 1945, §1912; RL 1955, §45-2; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §18; HRS §312-1; am L 1981, c 150, §5; am L 2015, c 26, §3]
